title: Multi-step Authentication Workflow
description: Verify that the multi-stage login, signup, password recovery, and session management workflow functions correctly.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page
Attempt to login with valid credentials
Confirm successful login and session establishment
Navigate to signup page and register with valid user data
Confirm successful account creation and login
Initiate password recovery with registered email
Verify password recovery email sent
Complete password reset with valid token and new password
Confirm password update and successful login with new password
Login and then logout to verify session termination
Confirm session ended and access to protected routes is denied
Attempt login with invalid credentials
Verify authentication failure with appropriate error messages

title: Financial Records Management
description: Validate creation, editing, categorization, filtering, alerts, and export of financial entries and exits.

steps.description: Create a new financial entry with valid category and amount
Verify that the financial entry is listed correctly with accurate details
Edit an existing financial record to change category and amount
Confirm the updates reflect correctly in the financial data
Apply category filters and date range filters in the financial records view
Verify the filtered list shows only the matching records
Trigger financial alerts by creating entries matching alert rules
Validate that real-time alerts are displayed and logged
Export financial data in CSV, JSON, and PDF formats
Confirm export files are correctly generated, contain accurate data, and conform to plan limitations
Attempt to create a financial record with invalid/negative amount
Verify that validation prevents the record and displays an appropriate error

title: Task and Agenda Management with Google Workspace Integration
description: Test task creation, editing, filtering, and synchronization with Google Calendar, Drive, and Tasks.

steps.description: Create a new task with priority, due date, and category
Confirm the task appears correctly in the task list with all specified attributes
Edit task to change status, priority, and details
Verify edits are saved and reflected in UI
Filter tasks by status, priority, and category
Check that filtered tasks match filter criteria
Create, edit, and delete calendar events in agenda views (day, week, month, year)
Validate events display correctly and persist through view changes
Integrate with Google Workspace to synchronize calendar events and tasks
Ensure synchronization is accurate and bi-directional
Attempt to create tasks and events with missing required fields
Verify proper validation errors are shown, and creation is blocked

title: Automated WhatsApp AI Agent Interactions
description: Validate AI sub-agents' handling of WhatsApp messages for financial entries, lead qualification, marketing reports, scheduling, development, and video content generation.

steps.description: Send a WhatsApp message to the agent registering a financial entry
Verify AI agent parses message, creates the record, and sends confirmation response
Send lead qualification message to SDR sub-agent
Confirm agent responds with qualification questions and records lead data
Request marketing insights report via WhatsApp message
Validate correct generation and delivery of marketing report
Schedule an appointment through WhatsApp interaction
Verify scheduling success with updated calendar event and notification
Request development support and video production sub-agent features via WhatsApp
Check that AI agents provide appropriate support or generate requested video content
Send malformed or unauthorized WhatsApp commands
Ensure AI agents reply with error or help messages following WhatsApp Business rules

title: Real-time Notifications and Alerts
description: Ensure notifications system delivers real-time alerts with correct state management, including bell icon and dropdown components.

steps.description: Trigger various notifications (financial alerts, task reminders, agent responses)
Verify notifications appear in real-time with correct content and timestamp
Click bell icon to open notifications dropdown
Confirm dropdown shows all active notifications with correct read/unread status
Mark notifications as read and dismiss some notifications
Validate state updates and that read/dismiss actions persist correctly
Receive simultaneous multiple notifications
Check that notification system handles concurrency without loss or duplication

title: Dashboard Visualizations and Data Integrity
description: Test that the dashboard displays accurate financial summaries, tasks, goals, charts, and agent insights.

steps.description: Login and access dashboard page
Verify presence of financial overviews, pending tasks, upcoming bills, goals, and insights widgets
Create financial records, tasks, and goals
Confirm dashboard updates dynamically with new data
Validate charts and timelines accurately reflect underlying data
Check data consistency and calculation correctness (e.g., totals, progress percentages)

title: Subscription Plan Restrictions and Feature Access
description: Ensure that users can only access features according to their subscription plan and that premium features are restricted accordingly.

steps.description: Login as Free plan user and attempt to access automated WhatsApp agents and backups
Confirm access is denied and appropriate upgrade prompts are shown
Login as Business plan user and access AI agents, backups, and support
Verify full access with prioritized support and backup functionalities
Attempt export of financial reports in multiple formats under different plans
Check exports are available only as per plan permissions and data is accurate
Attempt to enable add-ons or premium integrations in non-Premium plans
Verify feature access is blocked appropriately

title: Support and Help Request Workflow
description: Test submission, tracking, and SLA response behaviors of support requests according to subscription tiers.

steps.description: Submit support ticket as Free or Basic plan user
Verify ticket is accepted but marked with no SLA or low priority
Submit support ticket as Business or Premium plan user
Confirm ticket assigned high priority with 24/7 support availability
View support ticket list and filter by status or priority
Validate tickets display correctly with accurate status updates
Interact with FAQ and help resources
Confirm correct rendering and access to contextual help information

title: Backup and Restoration Conformance to 3-2-1 Policy
description: Verify backup mechanisms and restoration processes comply with the 3-2-1 backup policy especially for Premium plans.

steps.description: Perform backup setup and trigger manual backup on Premium plan
Ensure backups are stored in at least 3 copies with 2 different media types and 1 off-site
Simulate data loss and execute restoration from backup
Confirm data integrity and completeness after restoration
Attempt backup and restore actions on non-Premium plans
Verify actions are restricted and appropriate messaging is displayed

title: Compliance with LGPD and Data Privacy
description: Validate opt-in/out mechanisms, data retention policies, and privacy compliance based on LGPD regulations.

steps.description: Review user consent process during signup and feature enablement
Confirm clear and explicit consent request is presented and recorded
Perform user data access request and verify proper data export or deletion per LGPD rules
Check response completeness and timeliness according to privacy policies
Trigger automated deletion of data after retention period expires
Validate data is removed securely and logs comply with audit requirements
Attempt unauthorized data access or processing
Ensure access is denied and audit logs record the attempt

title: Progressive Web App (PWA) Offline Support
description: Check that the PWA features including offline support and service worker registration work as intended.

steps.description: Access the application with network connectivity
Confirm service worker registration and caching of appropriate assets
Go offline and reload the application
Verify that core pages and features are available and functional offline
Perform data entry actions offline (e.g. add financial record or task)
Ensure data is queued and synchronized when network reconnects

title: Advanced Security: Protected Routes and Data Sanitization
description: Validate protection of routes, features and input sanitization to prevent unauthorized access and injection attacks.

steps.description: Attempt to access protected routes without authentication
Confirm redirection to login page or access denied
Access protected features with insufficient permissions
Verify feature controls block access appropriately
Input malicious scripts or SQL injection strings in form fields
Validate inputs are sanitized and rejected if harmful
